thread.title: BRIEF-Aegion Corporation Reports Q1 Loss Per Share Of $0.06

title: BRIEF-Aegion Corporation Reports Q1 Loss Per Share Of $0.06
text:
May 2 (Reuters) - Aegion Corp:
* ORATION REPORTS 2018 FIRST QUARTER FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q1 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.13
* Q1 LOSS PER SHARE $0.06 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.13 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 REVENUE $325 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $309.2 MILLION
* CONTRACT BACKLOG AS OF MARCH 31, 2018 WAS $718 MILLION, AN INCREASE OF $58 MILLION, OR 9 PERCENT, FROM CONTRACT BACKLOG AT MARCH 31, 2017
* QTRLY NEW ORDERS GREW 1 PERCENT COMPARED TO Q1’17 TO $353 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
